definition: to confront/to face the enemy
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
enemy/to be a match for/to rival/to resist/to withstand
rival

sentences.english: The two countries combined together against their enemy.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個國家聯合起來一致對敵。

sentences.english: One should never owing to internal trouble forget our determination to join forces to oppose the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 切不可由於鬩牆之禍而忘了共同對敵的決心。

sentences.english: He regarded it as a triumph over the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 他把這看成是對敵鬥爭的勝利。

sentences.english: He enlisted with the air force to fight against the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 他應募加入空軍對敵作戰。

sentences.english: Educational cause was one of the important battlefronts in the period of anti-Japanese war.
sentences.chinese: 教育事業是抗日戰爭時期對敵鬥爭的一條重要戰線。

sentences.english: First, all the villagers are united against the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 第一，它必須是全鄉全村一致對敵的。

sentences.english: In the struggle against enemies, we should avoid wronging an innocent person.
sentences.chinese: 在對敵鬥爭中，我們要避免冤枉好人。

sentences.english: In spite of different opinions, we must stay together and jointly oppose the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 儘管有不同意見，我們必須團結一致共同對敵。

sentences.english: Our work to, develop diquat is mainly given in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文對敵草快原藥的合成進行了一定的研究。

sentences.english: Activated carbon fibres and the volume filling theory of adsorption in micropores;
sentences.chinese: 實驗研究了活性炭纖維電極對敵草隆的去除作用。

sentences.english: We should avoid wronging the good people in the fight against  enemies.
sentences.chinese: 在對敵鬥爭中，我們要避免冤枉好人。

sentences.english: Elimination of diuron on activated carbon fiber(ACF) electrode was carried out.
sentences.chinese: 實驗研究了活性炭纖維電極對敵草隆的去除作用。

sentences.english: They fought against the enemies fiercely.
We should avoid wronging good persons in the struggle against the enemy.
sentences.chinese: 在對敵鬥爭中，我們要避免冤枉好人。

sentences.english: Jinetes hurl their javelins before closing in and fighting with their cavalry swords.
sentences.chinese: 對敵時列成圓陣，標槍飛擲，然後揮動長劍殺入敵陣。

sentences.english: King Pyrrhus of Epirus used elephants as a shock tactic against his enemies.
sentences.chinese: 伊庇魯斯國王皮拉斯對敵會出動大象，以收震懾效果。

definition: enemy
to threaten the east and strike to the west (idiom)/to create a diversion
military strategy
to pursue and attack
the enemy and us
to control/to curb/to restrict/to impede/to pin down (enemy troops)
armed enemy of the nation/enemy of the Emperor/fig. championship challenger/contender opposing champion in sporting contest
to judge the hour and size up the situation/to take stock
to behead
many men, a great force (idiom); many hands provide great strength/There is safety in numbers.
to oppose each other with equal harshness (idiom); tit for tat/measure for measure
to dispatch/to assign/a dispatch
combined assault/to mount a joint attack
to run a newspaper/to publish a newspaper
to charge and break through enemy lines
to mount a sneak attack/to raid
